Package org.opensextant.giscore.input.shapefile

Class SingleShapefileInputHandler

java.lang.Object
org.opensextant.giscore.input.GISInputStreamBase
org.opensextant.giscore.input.shapefile.SingleShapefileInputHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, IGISInputStream
public class SingleShapefileInputHandler extends GISInputStreamBase
Read a single shapefile (.prj, .shp, .dbf, etc) to an object buffer for later processing. ...
Author:
DRAND

  • Constructor Details

    • SingleShapefileInputHandler

      public SingleShapefileInputHandler(InputStream shpStream, Map<ShapefileComponent,InputStream> otherStreams, String shapefilename) throws IOException
      Create SingleShapefileInputHandler for single shapefile given as a series of InputStreams.
      Parameters:
      shpStream - the shapefile (.shp) stream.
      otherStreams - any other shapefile components as streams, may be null.
      shapefilename - base shape file name (never null or blank string) without the .shp extension
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if shape stream is null or if shapefilename is null or blank string.
      IllegalStateException - if Schema not the first thing returned from dbf
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • SingleShapefileInputHandler

      public SingleShapefileInputHandler(File inputDirectory, String shapefilename) throws IOException
      Create SingleShapefileInputHandler for single shapefile given input directory and base filename (not including .shp extension) as base name for .shp, .dbf, and .prj files.
      Parameters:
      inputDirectory - input directory, must exist
      shapefilename - base shape file name (never null or blank string) without the .shp extension
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if Input directory is null or does not exist or if shapefilename is null or blank string.
      IllegalStateException - if Schema not the first thing returned from dbf
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes this input stream and releases any system resources associated with the stream.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if an I/O error occurs closing shp stream

    • read

      public IGISObject read() throws IOException
      Read the next feature from the shapefile. A shapefile will contain a uniform set of geometry features.
      Returns:
      the next feature or null if we are done.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      IllegalArgumentException - if unable to read a valid geometry

    • is3D

      protected boolean is3D(int shapeType)
      Utility method to test for 3D geometry based on shapeType code
      Parameters:
      shapeType -
      Returns:

    • isM

      protected boolean isM(int shapeType)
      Utility method to test for geometry that include M values. We ignore M values in these methods but must account for them in the data
      Parameters:
      shapeType -
      Returns:
